name: Pf
body:
### Getting to know d3
I'm still in the experimental phase, links will get you to the project pages. 

### Bar Chart
Toying with a data-set of land-sealing in Austria from 1961 - 2013.

### Stacked Stream
Again, the data-set on land-sealing in Austria. This time arranged in stacked stream-chart. Note that this chart makes NO SENSE at all. I just built it to play around with the stacked layout.

### Interactive Bar Chart
Land-sealing as interactive bar chart. Move the slider to see how it progresses. This chart has s few unsolved mysteries: "CrispEdges" does not seem to do the trick on the ticks. Sometimes they are 2 px wide. Also, once I try adding transitions, the madness starts.... .
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
